lead_paragraph: Swansea City captain Ashley Williams hopes the club's back-to-back Premier League victories have cheered up head coach Francesco Guidolin, who was admitted to hospital last week with chest infection.

headline.print_headline: Swansea's Williams Hopes Wins Just the Tonic for Manager Guidolin
headline.main: Swansea's Williams Hopes Wins Just the Tonic for Manager Guidolin
